data.title: How to sign in and out of PSN
data.meta_description: Learn how to sign in and out of PlayStation™Network on PlayStation®5 consoles, PlayStation®4 consoles and web browsers.
data.text:
PlayStation Network (PSN) is an online service that lets you expand your enjoyment of your console. To sign in to PSN, you must have an account and an Internet connection.

After you sign in once, you remain signed in until you sign out. You may be signed out at certain times, such as when there's a system software update or if there's a network outage.

Sign in with a passkey

Passkeys are a password replacement that provide faster, easier, and more secure sign-ins to websites and apps across your devices.

Sign out of PlayStation Network on PS5 consoles

Go to Settings > Users and Accounts.

Select Other > Sign Out.

Sign out of PlayStation Network on all devices

If you can't physically access your PlayStation console, you can sign out of all your devices by using Account Management online.
